parameters:
group_enemies.ObjectName() +
NewLine() + "---" + NewLine() +
"Health: " +
ToString(group_enemies.Health::Health()) +
NewLine() +
"Is Aggro: " + group_enemies.isAggro +
NewLine() +
"---" + NewLine() +
"N. Enemies: " +
ToString(SceneInstancesCount(group_enemies)) + " ; " +
NewLine() +
"N. Healthbars: " + ToString(SceneInstancesCount(enHealth_frame)) + " ; " +
NewLine() +
"N. Sights: " + ToString(SceneInstancesCount(enemy_sightManager)) + " ; " +
NewLine() +
"N. Weapons: " + ToString(SceneInstancesCount(group_enemyAccessories))

events.comment: * Define the initial Properties for the different Enemies, such as Headshot height an Max Speed
* Target Range
* Grunt
* Shooter
* Sniper
* Boss
* Spawn the Enemies from the Entities
* Overlap the Healthbar
* Link the Width of the Bar to the Enemy Health
* Show/hide Enemy healthbar
Initialize
When Target goes above the conesight degree(+60°), reset to its original rotation and repeat with the Timer
Check for sight lines with the Player, using the Sightline object. Every X seconds, move the checkline using the Timer
* Debug
Check if there's objects such as Walls that blocks vision, so Enemies won't Aggro

*** BUG *** It checks for player_hitbox only, and NOT player_hitbox_crouch!!! Refactor the code for both cases

Also still fucks with walls
There's no Objects blocking the Sight, Enemy sees the Player, so it becomes aggressive
*** BUG *** This reliably works but doesn't check for Walls
* If the Player shoots, alert all the Enemies within a Hearing range
* Set the Weapon to follow the Enemy position & angle
* Check if the Enemy has been Aggro'ed
* Rotates and moves toward the Player
* When close to the Player and on the same elevation, stops and hits him
* Set the Weapon to follow the Enemy position & angle
* Check if the Enemy has been Aggro'ed

* Places the Target somewhere near the Player and moves toward it with a Timer;

* When the Timer expires, Enemy stops and shoots a projectile toward the Player;
*** BUG *** Enemy doesn't stop, but behavior works...
* Trigger Aggro if player distance from Sniper is < view range
* Check if the Enemy has been Aggro'ed
* Set the Weapon to follow the Enemy position & angle
* Always point the Sniper at the Player

* Sniper is stationary

* Takes aim at the Player for about 4 seconds

* Timer's over, takes a high velocity shot, resets
*** Projectile here is the same as Shooter, find a way to change the Damage property
* Boss Enraged Status: at 40% Health, moves faster and beats harder
* Set the main Color of the Enemy when Enraged
* Check if the Enemy has been Aggro'ed
* Set the Weapon to follow the Enemy position & angle

* Places the Target somewhere near the Player and moves toward it with a Timer;

* When the Timer expires, Enemy stops and shoots a projectile toward the Player;
*** BUG *** Enemy doesn't stop, but behavior works...
* Debug
* Roll a chance between 1 and 100 when damaging an Enemy; also flash its color to Red to indicate Damage
* If the rolled chance was greater than the defined Stagger Threshold of the Enemy, Stagger him
* Staggering stops the movement for a brief moment and reset the current behavior of the Enemy
* Calculate Points for Quest 2 here
* Check when Health of Enemies reaches 0
* Check for Boss death in Quest 3 here
* Delete Enemies and related Objects
* Delete Projectiles if colliding with walls or out of bounds
* Damage Physic Objects
* Damage the Player
* Damage other Enemies
*** Needs to work for other than Grunts!
